        public void addUserToList(java.lang.String name,
                          java.net.InetAddress ip)
        Use full to add a user to a list, only if he is not actually in this list Update also the list on the controller in order to display the new list on the screen
        Parameters:
        name - the nick name of the user to add
        ip - his address IP
        See Also:
        User
